articles.description: All the fallout from the weekend action, plus latest on Jadon Sancho and Mohamed Salah, while Lionel Messi helps Inter Miami to victory.
articles.title: Premier League reaction after Arsenal beat Man Utd

articles.description: Police are investigating an alleged assault at the Emirates Stadium during Arsenal's 3-1 win over Manchester United on Sunday.
articles.title: Police investigating alleged assault on Keane

articles.description: Iga Swiatek's defence of the US Open title is ended by an explosive performance from the huge-hitting Jelena Ostapenko in the last 16.
articles.title: Top seed Swiatek stunned by Ostapenko at US Open

articles.description: Follow live text updates and BBC radio commentary from the second day of round 13 of the 2023 County Championship.
articles.title: County Championship, day two - radio & text

articles.description: Big players deliver the big moments to decide the big games and Arsenal's Declan Rice did that on every level against Manchester United, writes Phil McNulty.
articles.title: 'Big-moment player Rice delivers on every level'

articles.description: Match of the Day 2's Mark Chapman, Jermaine Jenas and Stephen Warnock discuss how Liverpool's Trent Alexander-Arnold delivered a "passing masterclass".
articles.title: MOTD2 analysis: How Alexander-Arnold gave a 'passing masterclass'

articles.description: Mercedes team principal Toto Wolff says Red Bull driver Max Verstappen's record of 10 consecutive wins is "completely irrelevant".
articles.title: Verstappen record is 'completely irrelevant' - Wolff

articles.description: Watch the best shots from New Zealand opener Finn Allen as his score of 83 inspires New Zealand to a 74-run win over England at Edgbaston.
articles.title: Allen masterclass inspires New Zealand's 74-run victory

articles.description: Britain's Jack Draper says he had a "70-30 chance" of not playing the US Open after another injury - now he faces Andrey Rublev for a quarter-final spot.
articles.title: Britain's Draper bids for US Open quarter-finals

articles.description: No red meat, seaweed packaging and electric lawnmowers - Edgbaston's Go Green game shows a possibility for cricket's future.
articles.title: Was Edgbaston's eco-T20 a glimpse to cricket's future?
